DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : The purpose study evaluate impact circulate miR-126 left ventricular remodel clinical outcome patient undergo primary percutaneous coronary intervention ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction .
DOC.brief_title: Circulating miR-126 Novel Biomarker Post Myocardial Infarction Remodeling
DOC.criteria: Admitted primary PCI STEMI involve LAD within 12 hour onset symptom . STEMI define typical ECG change ( ST segment elevation ≥2mm 2 precordial lead ) associate acute chest pain elevation cardiac enzyme ; Age ≥18 year ; Informed consent patient next kin . Nonischaemic Cardiomyopathy ; Cardiac surgery plan 6 month ; Mechanical complication STEMI ( ventricular septal rupture , free wall rupture , acute severe mitral regurgitation ) ; Renal hepatic failure ; Malignancy , HIV , central nervous system disorder ; Cardiopulmonary resuscitation > 15 min compromise level consciousness ; Cardiogenic shock ; Current participation research study involve investigational drug device ; No write consensus ; Previous myocardial infarction .
